messages.message: Froggos have a little joke, that the world is so hard a man must have two fathers to look after him, and that's why they have God Froggers
I'll make him an offer he can't refuse.
The froggo with the long tongue can steal more fies than the man with the gun.
A man who doesn't spend time with his family can never be a real man.
I guess just wasn't enough time, Michael. Just wasn't enough time.
I'll make him an offer he can't refuse.
The froggo with the long tongue can steal more fies than the man with the gun.
I'll make him an offer he can't refuse.
The froggo with the long tongue can steal more fies than the man with the gun.
I'll make him an offer he can't refuse.
The froggo with the long tongue can steal more fies than the man with the gun.
It's an old ribbit. I spent my life trying not to be careless -- frogettes and tadpoles can be careless, but not froggos.
